dict.string: The app needs camera access so the user can take photos on reference points along the survey. Each photo is saved in the gallery with embedded survey data.
We need to be able to save the photos from the survey to the gallery.
We need access to microphone to use audio based odometer. ( detecting the wheel's rotation using a ratchet based clicker )
Needed to connect to BLE sonar device
This app requires access to your photo library to display your photos.
Needed to communicate with BLE sonar device
